content: chick jagger is the smoothest operator in the yard he is a quick and easy crochet chicken pattern that is perfect for spring and easter gifting this chick is too cute to resist accessible for beginner crocheters this amigurumi pattern works up in a flash for last minute easter gifts as well he also has a brother named sir clucksalot who is chick s furry twin his pattern is also available here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sir-clucksalot on ravelry as well **ad-free pdf versions of the full pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/988371773/chick-jagger-crochet-chicken-crochet utm_source=copy&utm_medium=listingmanager&utm_campaign=share&utm_term=so lmsm&share_time=1616722274653 **in my etsy shop ** **terminology ** u s terminology **abbreviations ** chain = chain fo = finish off mc = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet scdec = single_crochet decrease scinc = single_crochet increase slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch **follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb https //www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb https //www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb https //www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg view_as=subscriber **blog ** www theloopylamb com www theloopylamb com **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com
